hadiths.text: A'isha reported:I was sleeping in front of the Mcsseinger ef Allah (ﷺ) with my legs between him and the Qibla. When he prostrated himself he pinched me and I drew up my legs, and when be stood up, I stretched them out. She said: At that time there were no lamps in the houses

chapter.eng-name: Lying In Front Of One Who Is Praying
